snippet: Carlos Slim Helú, the Mexican billionaire, is financing an Internet television network called Ora.tv that will feature Larry King, the former CNN interviewer, in a return to the interviewer's chair, reports Brian Stelter in Media Decoder.
abstract: Carlos Slim Helú, the Mexican billionaire, is financing an Internet television network called Ora.tv that will feature Larry King, the former CNN interviewer, in a return to the interviewer's chair, reports Brian Stelter in Media Decoder.

headline.main: Media Decoder: New Internet TV Network to Feature Larry King
